Title: Hurricane
Plot: When a major hurricane moves inland, all take refuge in the Leery home, where Dawson rages at Jen about her past, and Mitch storms out after learning of Gale's affair. That leaves a tormented Dawson to deal with their fallout. Meanwhile, Pacey ruins his brother's chances to get with Tamara at her beach house.
ParentalRatingReason: PG Violence, coarse language and sexual references
GuestStars: Dylan Neal, Obi Ndefo, Leann Hunley, Ric Reitz, Patt Noday
